markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Venom Spit](/Feats.aspx?ID=3990) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 50</row>

</column>

---

You've learned the art of lobbing toxic spittle at vulnerable spots on your foes, especially the eyes. You gain a venomous spit ranged unarmed attack with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 10 feet that deals 1d4 poison damage. On a critical hit, the target takes [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Your spit doesn't have a weapon group, nor a critical specialization effect.

**Special** If you have the [hooded nagaji](/Heritages.aspx?ID=216) heritage, in addition to your venomous spit's normal critical hit effect, the target is also [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the start of your next turn.
name: Venom Spit
